Metadata.Title: CVE-2007-2768 affecting package openssh for versions less than 9.5p1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2007-2768 affecting package openssh for versions less than 9.5p1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 9.5p1-2, affected by CVE-2007-2768
